org.apache.spark.ml.classification

Class LinearSVCAggregator

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.ml.classification.LinearSVCAggregator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class LinearSVCAggregator
extends Object
implements scala.Serializable
    LinearSVCAggregator computes the gradient and loss for hinge loss function, as used in binary classification for instances in sparse or dense vector in an online fashion.

    Two LinearSVCAggregator can be merged together to have a summary of loss and gradient of the corresponding joint dataset.

    This class standardizes feature values during computation using bcFeaturesStd.

    param: bcCoefficients The coefficients corresponding to the features. param: fitIntercept Whether to fit an intercept term. param: bcFeaturesStd The standard deviation values of the features.

    See Also:

      • merge

        public LinearSVCAggregator merge(LinearSVCAggregator other)
        Merge another LinearSVCAggregator, and update the loss and gradient of the objective function. (Note that it's in place merging; as a result, this object will be modified.)

        Parameters:
        other - The other LinearSVCAggregator to be merged.
        Returns:
        This LinearSVCAggregator object.
